parameters.name: HistoryPrintTopic
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to send the historical topic to the printer.

*   false (default): The topic that is sent to the printer is in the \*\*/ext/rrpc/+/{pk}/{dn}/user/print\*\* format.
*   true: The topic that is sent to the printer is in the \*\*/ext/rrpc/+/{pk}/{dn}/print\*\* format.

parameters.name: IotId
parameters.description:
The device ID.

> If you specify this parameter, you do not need to specify the **ProductKey** and **DeviceName** parameters. **IotId** specifies a globally unique identifier (GUID) of the device, which corresponds to a combination of **ProductKey** and **DeviceName**. If you specify the **IotId**, **ProductKey**, and **DeviceName** parameters, the value of the **IotId** parameter takes precedence.

parameters.name: IotInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

You do not need to specify this parameter.

parameters.name: ParamsJsonString
parameters.description: The template parameters. You can obtain the template of receipts in the Letter Sending Service console, and configure parameters in the template to create a custom receipt that you want to print.

parameters.name: ProductKey
parameters.description:
The unique identifier of the product to which the device belongs.

> If you specify the **ProductKey** parameter, you must also specify the **DeviceName** parameter.

parameters.name: TemplateBizCode
parameters.description: The template identifier. You can obtain the template identifier in the Letter Sending Service console.
